body:
I'm bored. shoot!
Likes:
Teamspeak
Avicus Community
Tnt cannons
Sushi. (Not my favorite food though.) *world explodes
Jamaican Bacon! (It's a tourney clan)
The Ladies on teamspeak. So I can hit on th- cough cough I mean socialise with them.
Most of the moderators. They actually do a pretty fine job at what they do. 

Dislikes:
Cocky people. Oh I iz teh pvp god111!! will instantly earn you an enemy on my list.
Getting 270+ ping on avicus and scrim servers
Lag (Who doesn't)
When people cover the monument in wood.
Hackusaters that say "reach hacks" -.-
When people grief my tnt cannons. 
When people prefer fished cooked than raw.
 Also this is me :3
